description: The 47 high-velocity fields that ALL LLMs must search for when MLS data is missing
changelog: Expanded from 34 to 47 fields - added permits (59-62), structure (40,46), features (133-135, 138), natural gas (109)

fields.name: market_value_estimate
fields.description: Automated valuation model estimate of property value

fields.name: roof_age_est
fields.description: Estimated roof age (from permits or year built)

fields.name: hvac_age
fields.description: HVAC system age (from permits or year built)

fields.name: permit_history_roof
fields.description: Roof permit history from county records

fields.name: permit_history_hvac
fields.description: HVAC permit history from county records

fields.name: median_home_price
fields.description: Median home price in the neighborhood

fields.name: price_per_sqft_recent
fields.description: Recent price per square foot in the area

fields.name: days_on_market_avg
fields.description: Average days on market for similar properties

fields.name: inventory_surplus
fields.description: Current inventory surplus in the market

fields.name: comparable_sales
fields.description: Recent comparable sales in the area

fields.name: electric_provider
fields.description: Electric utility provider for the area

fields.name: water_provider
fields.description: Water utility provider for the area

fields.name: natural_gas
fields.description: Natural gas provider name or 'None' if all-electric

fields.name: cable_tv_provider
fields.description: Cable TV provider for the area

fields.name: smart_home_features
fields.description: Smart home technology (Nest, Alexa, smart locks, etc.)

fields.name: view
fields.description: Property view description (water, mountain, city, golf, etc.)

fields.name: avg_sale_to_list_pct
fields.description: Average sale to list price percentage

fields.name: avg_days_to_pending
fields.description: Average days from listing to pending
